pt.profile-card.closed.account.description: A text in a grey lozenge shows that this user is closed/deleted

pt.profile-card.closed.account.has.date..message: Their account has been deleted for a few months.

pt.profile-card.disabled.account.default.description: A default name when we cannot get name of an inactive or closed user

pt.profile-card.general.msg.disabled.use.description: A first sentence of a long text explains this user is inactive/closed
pt.profile-card.general.msg.disabled.use.message: You can no longer collaborate with this person.
